title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not visible when dataset is not set
EB: The group dialog should be visible even when the dataset is not set. When adding a table report item without setting the dataset, the user should still be able to create a new table group. They should be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Open the software
2. Add a table report item without setting the dataset
3. Try to create a new table group
4. Verify that the group dialog is not visible
